name: help
help:
Use this command for detailed information on each command.

*Usage Examples*
`r!help 8ball` Gives help information for `r!8ball` command.

name: ping
help: Returns the response time, or ping, of a message.

name: coin
help: Flips a coin. Can land on heads, tails, or its side.

name: dice
help: Tosses a six-sided die. Can also be executed with `r!die`.

name: die
help: Tosses a six-sided die. Can also be executed with `r!dice`.
